metadata.title: CVE-2017-2591 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
389-ds-base before version 1.3.6 is vulnerable to an improperly NULLterminated array in the uniqueness_entry_to_config() function in the"attribute uniqueness" plugin of 389 Directory Server. An authenticated, orpossibly unauthenticated, attacker could use this flaw to force anout-of-bound heap memory read, possibly triggering a crash of the LDAPservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2591` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.0.18-1
389-ds-base - 1.4.0.18-1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.0.18-1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.0.18-1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.0.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.18-1').
